==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|らい|じん|ちょう|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
{{calque|ja|雷神鳥|etyl term=thunderbird|etyl lang=en|sort=らいじんちょう}}. This term is built from the components {{l|ja|雷神|tr=''raijin''|gloss=thunder god}} + {{l|ja|鳥|tr=''chō''|gloss=bird}} rather than the expected {{l|ja|雷|tr=''rai''|gloss=thunder}} + {{l|ja|鳥|tr=''chō''|gloss=bird}} because the term {{l|ja|雷鳥}} had already been used to mean {{term|ptarmigan|rock ptarmigan}}, a type of [[snow]] [[grouse]] native to Japan.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|らいじんちょう}}

# a [[thunderbird]]

====Usage notes====
The term {{ja-r|サンダーバード}} is more commonly used as a translation for the English term {{m|en|thunderbird}}.
